S

searchByGenre() - Method in class Controller
Gets the list of checkboxes from View It runs through the list and makes a new list containing text of all checked checkboxes Tries to call view.update() with parameter gained by calling a method in SearchEngine with the recently list of checked genres Should the list be empty it will receive an Exception from SearchEngine and show all Media instead of none.
SearchEngine - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is responsible for handling the data by sorting and holding the media provided by the FileReader class.
SearchEngine() - Constructor for class SearchEngine
 
searchEngine - Variable in class Controller
 
searchField - Variable in class View
 
searchForString() - Method in class Controller
Tries to call view.update() with a list of Media, The list is retrieved by a method in searchEngine with search-parameter retrieved from View Should the list be empty it will notify the user and display all Media instead of none.
Season - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a class to respresent a season of a series.
Season(int, ArrayList<Episode>, int) - Constructor for class Season
Constructor of season.
seasonNumber - Variable in class Season
 
seasons - Variable in class Series
 
Series - Class in <Unnamed>
This is a class to represent a TV-series.
Series(String, String, String[], String, BufferedImage, ArrayList<Season>) - Constructor for class Series
Constructor of Series.
setEpisodes(ArrayList<Episode>) - Method in class Season
 
setViewState(int) - Method in class SearchEngine
Sets the viewState of the SearchEngine, so that it knows whether or not the user is currently looking at the all Media, only Movies, or only Series
showMovies() - Method in class Controller
Sets the viewState of SearchEngine to 2 so that is knows that the user is currently looking at all Media of type Movie.
showSeries() - Method in class Controller
Sets the viewState of SearchEngine to 1 so that is knows that the user is currently looking at all Series.
sortByCategory(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class SearchEngine
Searches for movies matching any of the Categories given as Parameter.
sortByName(String) - Method in class SearchEngine
Searches for a movie title matching the title given by the user.
sortByTypeOfMedia(String) - Method in class SearchEngine
Searches for and returns all Media of given type.
